memories.value: Building a system that is powerful, stable, scalable, and manageable.
The primary data center has approximately 150kW of power and cooling headroom available for Phase 1.
Positioning the new cluster to attract a major federal grant within the next three years.
Just met with the Dean of Engineering; demand for AI/ML research support is at an all-time high.
Finalizing the requirements for Phase 1, specifically storage architecture and the CPU/GPU node balance.
Global supply chain issues for high-end processors might cause delays.
